definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.chinese: 这条路是由鹅卵石铺成的。

sentences.english: Man-made fragments of all kinds still lie among the pebbles.
sentences.chinese: 人造各种物品的碎片仍然躺着鹅卵石间。

sentences.english: While children gather pebbles And scatter them again.
sentences.chinese: 而孩子们将鹅卵石拾起又抛散。

sentences.english: I’m the pebble in your shoe, reminding you to tread lightly.
sentences.chinese: 我是你鞋里的鹅卵石，随时提醒你小心行事。

sentences.english: Jack toed at a pebble on the pavement.
sentences.chinese: 杰克不安的把脚趾在地上的鹅卵石上来回蹭着。

sentences.english: The historic district has the cobblestone atmosphere you've come to expect from town in the Alps.
sentences.chinese: 历史区有鹅卵石气氛，你来期望从镇位于阿尔卑斯山。

sentences.english: Some are as small as pebbles, so how do you distinguish them from ordinary rocks in the sand?
sentences.chinese: 有些跟鹅卵石一般大小，那么如何区分二者？

sentences.english: Pebbled leather gladiator sandals in black.
sentences.chinese: 鹅卵石皮革黑角斗士凉鞋。

sentences.english: Cottrell strode out across the cobbled courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 科特雷尔穿过铺着鹅卵石的院子大步走出来。

sentences.english: Because the peddles in the original walls.
Along the same lines of the Pebble concept is the Electrolux Renew.
sentences.chinese: 与鹅卵石式洗衣机相同概念的是伊莱克斯新型洗衣机。

sentences.english: He picked up one pebble, and, when it felt cold, he threw it into the sea.
sentences.chinese: 他捡起一棵鹅卵石，当他感到凉凉的便将它仍入大海。

sentences.english: The patron came down a path paved with cobblestones .
sentences.chinese: 赞助人经过一条铺着鹅卵石的小路。

sentences.english: But the peddles collected from walls was not enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是采凿下来的鹅卵石是远远不够的。

sentences.english: Riders fall on the cobblestones during the third stage July 6.
sentences.chinese: 骑士落在鹅卵石在第三阶段，7月6日。

sentences.english: The first cobblestone pavement was laid on Gravier and Magazine Streets in 1817.
sentences.chinese: 第一条鹅卵石卢是在1817即那里起来的。

definition: road or pavement laid with flagstones
crushed or broken rock, stone etc
